issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://football.fantasysports.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffootball.fantasysports.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > Any time I click on the “view all” of “transaction trends”, the yahoo fantasy sports app immediately crashes. > > This just started happening with the new version 11.6.0 of the app. > > If I disable dns or use a different dns server, the app works and has an ad at the top of the page. issue.title: www.fileplanet.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.fileplanet.com/archive/p-19287/Half-Life-2-Friendly-Fire-Modification/download](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fileplanet.com%2Farchive%2Fp-19287%2FHalf-Life-2-Friendly-Fire-Modification%2Fdownload) ### Comment > Some banner ads. > > Download page has interesting stuff. First there is a download button that downloads an .exe. After that is clicked, button turns into a blue link that downloads a .zip when clicked. > > I'm not sure if .exe is harmful or not but this site behaviour is indeed strange. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fjf3kkmfxvk0ck8k4sgkcw0kco8gsws9j13r8glu78.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/63rmx85lidc0kwwg8cs44koswwcssgskqm4gcf2lzk.png?nc=1)
